EmailTemplate.name: 201911_Global_HoneywellForgePTMD_KK.PTMD Sunset - redirect date
EmailTemplate.subject: New PTMD URL is live (redirect starts Nov 25)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please use the new PTMD link We have completed the process of migrating our Predictive Trend Monitoring and Diagnostics (PTMD) solution into Honeywell Forge. Starting tomorrow, November 25th, there will an automatic redirect from your legacy PTMD login to the new login page. As per previous communications, the new application is hosted here:
- Visit: https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/ <[[https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/]]> - Launch Connected Maintenance - User name: use your existing user name - Password: use your existing password
Please make sure you bookmark the new application URL and share it with colleagues who are using PTMD. If you experience any problems, our support team is available for your questions.
Note: there is no additional cost associated with the transition to Honeywell Forge. DOWNLOAD MIGRATION GUIDE (2MB) <[[ https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_Forge_PTMD_Migration.pdf]]>
